page.title: 15Life in Brock' 2
page.content: When asked about their places of employment it was most interesting to find that {30}of the households had no-one that worked in the village. Brockenhurst is on the main railway line to {London}and it is less than { {90 minutes}on the train to the capital. This has resulted in many commuters living in the New Forest and especially in Brockenhurst. The oil refinerys at Fawley have also brought an influx of businessmen,engineers and scientists to the Brockenhurst area. House prices have risen considerably over the last few years and look set to remain much higher than average for the South of England for some time to come.
